name: Hoodwinkle's Last Stand
description:
Please download the Windows version as a first preference!

Defend the town hall of Hoodwinkle from the treacherous bandits and corrupt gold tycoons.

Made for the Ben Bok Game Jam 1, with the theme of "Trust No One" in 72 hours.

This was my first ever game jam, so I hope you enjoy it!

Credits: mostly all my own work, one or two free-to-use sound effects.

Engine: Unity       Music: made in Bosca Ceoil
